long_description: The Thule Strolling Kit is an easy-to-install kit with 2 pivoting wheels so you can go for relaxed strolls with the kiddos. It works with all Thule Chariot Stroller models except the Chinook 1 and 2. 8 in. wheels make walking easy; when not in use, they flip up under the chassis.
short_description: The Thule Strolling Kit is an easy-to-install kit with 2 pivoting wheels so you can go for relaxed strolls with the kiddos. It works with all Thule Chariot Stroller models except the Chinook 1 and 2.
